name: Billy the giant hates dancing paragliders on a boat
name_original: Billy the giant hates dancing paragliders on a boat
description:
Ludum Dare 40 entry

"The more you have, the worse it is"

CONTROLS

Z pick up / throw  
X telechinesis slowdown (?)

Against all odds I manage to finish something that ressembles a game :P I didn’t have enough time to make something cooler for this one, but hey! at least I made a tune with pico-8’s music tracker, that’s something new for me!

Fast description:

  • Only 5 levels
  • Burn alive dancing paragliders by throwing them to the fire
  • Too many paragliders on your boat and Billy will die
  • Delay paragliders landing by using your shiny forehead (use it wisely!)
  • Awesome retro grafics, music and SFX

If you want to support me you can also do that by clicking on the following button :)
